text: Magomed Idrisovich Ibragimov (, born 2 June 1985) is a Russian-born naturalized Uzbekistani wrestler of Avar descent, who competes in the heavyweight freestyle division. He won bronze medals at the 2016 Olympics and 2018 Asian Games. Ibragimov took up wrestling at age 12 in Makhachkala, Russia, and studied at the Dagestan State Pedagogical University there. He initially represented Russia, but in 2016 received the Uzbekistani citizenship. He was selected for the 2016 Olympics in May 2016 by winning the second place at the qualification tournament in Ulaanbaatar. ==References== Category:Olympic wrestlers of Uzbekistan Category:Russian male sport wrestlers Category:Wrestlers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in wrestling Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Uzbekistan Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Charodinsky District Category:Wrestlers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Uzbekistan Category:Asian Games competitors for Uzbekistan
title: Magomed Ibragimov (wrestler, born 1985)
